battlecode.common

Class GameConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • battlecode.common.GameConstants

  • public class GameConstants
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines constants that affect gameplay.

    • Field Summary

      static int BASE_INCOME_PER_ROUND
      The amount of soup each team receives per turn.

      The maximum number of integers that can be sent in one message.

      The radius that net guns can shoot.

      The number of indicator strings that a player can associate with a robot.

      The number of transactions that get broadcasted every round.

      The amount of soup that a miner gets when performing one mine action.

      The current spec version the server compiles with.

      • MIN_WATER_ELEVATION

        public static final int MIN_WATER_ELEVATION
        The elevation of the lowest tile that has water in it on a map. Every map needs to have a tile with exactly this elevation in the beginning.
        See Also:

      • INITIAL_COOLDOWN_TURNS

        public static final int INITIAL_COOLDOWN_TURNS
        The initial cooldown level. How many turns a newly created robot (that is, excluding the HQ) needs to wait.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        See Also:

      • GAME_MAX_NUMBER_OF_ROUNDS

        public static final int GAME_MAX_NUMBER_OF_ROUNDS
        The maximum number of rounds in a game. In practice, this is not needed, because the water level at round 10,000 will be huge.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
